last_episode_to_air.name: I Love You
last_episode_to_air.overview: The tourists say their goodbyes to France and each other as they head back to Korea. Will fate bring them together again?

name: The Package
overview: A group of strangers meet as part of a sightseeing tour in France, but end up learning more about one another than the tourist spots that they visit.

episodes.name: I Didn't Want To Leave
episodes.overview: After splitting with her husband, Yoon So So begins giving tours of France to Korean travelers. Her newest tour gets off to a bad start when traveler San Ma Ru gets held up by airport security.

episodes.name: I Should Have Met Him
episodes.overview: So So and Ma Ru's personal problems catch up with them, and a relaxing vacation turns dangerously stressful.

episodes.name: Don't Cry, Or A Snake Will Come Out
episodes.overview: Bok Ja contemplates her dreary life. Ma Ru is continuously pressured to return home, and more importantly, back to work.

episodes.name: It Will Work It, As Long As You Don't Mess Up Again
episodes.overview: So So's relationship to her mysterious stalker is revealed. Ma Ru plans to return to Korea early, but first he gets himself literally trapped in a tight situation.

episodes.name: Love Is The Easiest
episodes.overview: Kyung Jae's vacation plans are put on hold when his relationship and finances begin to crumble. So So and Ma Ru confide in each other before he leaves the group.

episodes.name: Just Like A French Film
episodes.overview: So Ran wishes to live more than an average life. Ma Ru causes even more trouble when he wanders into a forbidden area.

episodes.name: The Time It Takes To Love
episodes.overview: So So and Ma Ru find themselves feeling awkward after spending a night together. The group arrives in Saint-Malo.

episodes.name: The Time It Takes To Break Up
episodes.overview: Ma Ru becomes jealous when So So meets up with her friends around Honfleur, who all happen to be male.

episodes.name: A Man And A Woman
episodes.overview: The true nature of the relationship between Yeon Sung and Na Hyun is revealed. The group takes on the casinos of Deauville.

episodes.name: You Don't Even Understand
episodes.overview: A look at Na Hyun's school project reveals its controversial nature. Back in France, she causes more trouble when she disappears in Deauville.

episodes.name: I Lived Like A Fool
episodes.overview: As the trip winds down, Ma Ru hopes to convince So So to date him formally. Gab Soo wishes that Bok Ja would concentrate more on living. So Ran and Kyung Jae reach their seven year anniversary.

episodes.name: I Love You
episodes.overview: The tourists say their goodbyes to France and each other as they head back to Korea. Will fate bring them together again?
